name: The Benefits of CNA Training
short_description: Certified nursing assistants are currently high in demand due to the growing health care industry and increasing number of elderly people in assisted care. According to the Bureau of Labor Statistics, the demand for CNAs is expected to increase by 18% by 2018. The nursing assistant field also has a high turnover rate because many CNAs go on to become RNs or physicians. CNAs are part of a vital support system in the medical field and they are always in demand. The following CNA information can help you decide if this type of training is right for you.
